description: Variation of Condition 1 of planning permission dated 26 April 2016 (RN: 15/11131/FULL) for creation of a new basement level below the lower ground floor, erection of lower ground floor infill extension, rear extensions at first and second floor level, creation of roof terrace at second floor level, modifications to the mansard roof, mechanical plant at lower ground and roof levels, internal works and maintenance to the external facades NAMELY, Omission of basement level, replacement of stone surface to existing front lightwell, retention of existing terrace to rear of ground floor (and omission of tea room),  internalisation of existing glazed front lightwell to enlarge lower ground floor level, omission of plant equipment at roof level and associated internal works at lower ground, ground second, third and fourth floor levels.
decision_conditions: Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
